animeDescription: Yui's father forbids Yui from staying at Junpei's house and decides she'll attend a local High School instead of Oumi Academy. Junpei visits with the intention of straightening out a misunderstanding for Yui's sake. Episode takes place prior to Episode 10 of Ichigo 100% TV series.
animeCharacters: ['Nishino, Tsukasa', 'Toujou, Aya', 'Kitaouji, Satsuki', 'Manaka, Junpei', 'Minamito, Yui', 'Sotomura, Misuzu']
